Description:
Detects actions taken by Windows Defender malware detection engines

Author: Ján Trenčanský
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Defender Threat Detected
Query: sourcetype="windows-windefend" (eventid="1006" OR eventid="1015" OR eventid="1116" OR eventid="1117")
